content.text:
Table 23 contains Optional rows designated with (O).
Start of Informative Comment
*ACE1 means that row is (M) if the TPer supports either Activate or Revert, and (N) otherwise.
End of Informative Comment

[Table: table_46_729]


[Table: table_47_124]
